name: Diamiu
description: This is a collection of poems of Cheikh Ibrahim Inyass named entitled Jmiu Jawmiu Dawwinu with 7 chapters in it. We can find the favorites button to access the most known poems like Nrul Bassar, Hasb Bihi, Fa Madhu Shaykhi, Muhammadul Mustaf, Inna Khatmal Anbiy-i, Sriman Waslal Ghawn, Rhul Adab, ...
